title: Maxwell's Workshop
data:
{{version029}}{{stub}} '''Maxwell's Workshop''' is a [[wizlab]]. ==Summary== Maxwell's Workshop is filled with constructs and big workers, from the [[fire giant]]s and [[frost giant]]s to [[angel]]s. Most of the non-constructs here wield [[brand]]ed [[great mace]]s. Many of the random artefacts have "dangerous" properties, like [[rampaging]], [[ponderousness]], and rings of [[ring of fire|fire]] and [[ring of ice|ice]]. There is also a chance for both of Maxwell's inventions - [[Maxwell's patent armour]] and [[Maxwell's thermic engine]] - to generate here. ==Monsters== {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0;" | {{monsterlink|Peacekeeper}} | {{monsterlink|Gargoyle (monster)}} | {{monsterlink|War gargoyle}} | {{monsterlink|Molten gargoyle}} |- | {{monsterlink|Earth elemental}} | {{monsterlink|Fire elemental}} | {{monsterlink|Salamander}} | {{monsterlink|Salamander tyrant}} |- | {{monsterlink|Fire giant}} | {{monsterlink|Frost giant}} | {{monsterlink|Ettin}} | {{monsterlink|Ironbound thunderhulk}} |- | {{monsterlink|Angel}} | {{monsterlink|Crystal guardian}} | {{monsterlink|Lightning spire}} | {{monsterlink|Electric golem}} |- |} A single [[electric golem]] waits at the end of the wizlab, at the topmost room. ==Map== [[File:Maxwell minimap 029.png]] MAP vvvvvvvvvvv vvv..eeree..vvv v6s..rrrrr..s6v v..s.sspss.s..v vv...psspssp...vv v...r.prprp.r...v vq.r..rpppr..r.qv vqq..ppppppp..qqv vqqqq6qeeq7q6qqqv vqqq.q7qeeq.qqqqv vqq..ppppppp..qqv vvvvvvvvvvvvvvq.r..rpppr..r.qv vlllllvvvvvvvv...r.prprp.r...v vlllllvvvvvvvvv...psspssp...vv vlllllvvvvvvvvv6.s.sspss.s.6v vlllllvvvvvvvvvvs..rrrrr..svv vvnnlnnvvvvvvvvvvvv...r...vvv vv.3nln3.vvvvvvvvvvvvv+++vvv vv..2nln2..vvvvvvvvvvvH6.6Hvvvvv vv...2nln2...vvvvvvvvvv.....vvvvvv v2.2nnnlnnn2.2vvvvvH...4...4...Hvv v...nllllln...vvvvv....v111v....vv v...nllllln...vvvvv....veeev....vv v2..nllllln..2vvvvvH...vvvvv...Hvv v...nllllln...vvvvvvvD..bbb..Dvvvv v..2nllllln2..vvvvH..DD..H..DD..Hv vG..nnnnnnn..Gv..v....v..P..v....v v...3..3..3...+.4+....v.....v....v v...v..2..v...v..v....vH...Hv....v v...v2.3.2v...vvvvH..EvvFFFvvE..Hv v2vvvvdddvvvv2vvvvvvvEH.....HEvvvv v...vvvdvvv...vvvvvvv....v....v v...vvvvvvv...vvvvvvv....v....v vv..vv222vv..vvvvvvvvH.......Hv vv.........vvvvvvvvvvvvv+vvvvvv vv.......vvvvvvvvv1.~.5...5.1v vv.....vvvvvvvvvv..~..1.....v vvv+vvvvvvvvvvvv..v--v--v..v vv.....vvvvvvvvvv..v1.v..v..v
